sentences.sContent: I need not press the urgency of the matter on you, as I konw you are fully aware of it yourselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: I need not press the urgency of the matter on you, as I konw you are fully aware of it yourselves.
sentences.sCn: 我无需向你们强调此事的急迫性，因为我知道，你们自己对此完全了解。

sentences.sContent: But what is ultimately most important here is that you are asking the question —not just of me but of yourselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: But what is ultimately most important here is that you are asking the question —not just of me but of yourselves.
sentences.sCn: 但是我在这儿说的最重要的是：你们在问那些问题——不仅是问我，而是在问你们自己。

trans.tranCn: 你们自己；你们本人（yourself的复数）
